languages.text: Среди еретиков, взятых в плен при высадке, оказалось несколько командиров. Они охотно показали точное расположение вражеских когитаторов и предоставили декрипторные литании для доступа к защитным системам. Все мы в тот час возблагодарили Лорд-капитана за мудро избранную {mf|им|ею} тактику устрашения, использованную в начале планетарного штурма.

traits.locale_text: Тактика устрашения, избранная Лорд-капитаном, дала свои плоды — среди еретиков, сдавшихся в плен, оказалось несколько командиров отрядов противника, знакомых с планами дока Мю-514. Они были готовы показать техножрецам точное расположение вражеских когитаторов и предоставить декрипторные литании для доступа к защитным системам.

languages.text: There were several enemy commanders among the heretics we captured upon landing. They were eager to show us the exact locations of enemy cogitators and provided us with decryption litanies to access the defence systems. That was the hour when we all thanked the Lord Captain for having made the wise choice of intimidating the enemy at the first stage of the planetary assault.
languages.original_text: Среди еретиков, взятых в плен при высадке, оказалось несколько командиров. Они охотно показали точное расположение вражеских когитаторов и предоставили декрипторные литании для доступа к защитным системам. Все мы в тот час возблагодарили Лорд-капитана за мудро избранную {mf|им|ею} тактику устрашения, использованную в начале планетарного штурма.

That was the hour when we all thanked the Lord Captain for having made the wise choice of intimidating the enemy at the first stage of the planetary assault.

languages.text: 早在我们登陆行星时，我们便捕获了一部分异端分子，其中包括几位指挥官。他们迫不及待地告知我们敌方沉思者的具体位置，还向我们提供了访问防御系统所需的解密算法。到了这个时候，我们所有人都在感谢舰长大人的英明决定，感谢{mf|他|她}在攻打行星的第一阶段，就做出了威慑敌人的明智抉择。
languages.original_text: There were several enemy commanders among the heretics we captured upon landing. They were eager to show us the exact locations of enemy cogitators and provided us with decryption litanies to access the defence systems. That was the hour when we all thanked the Lord Captain for having made the wise choice of intimidating the enemy at the first stage of the planetary assault.

traits.locale_text: 早在我们登陆行星时，我们便捕获了一部分异端分子，其中包括几位指挥官。他们迫不及待地告知我们敌方思考器的具体位置，还向我们提供了访问防御系统所需的解密算法。到了这个时候，我们所有人都在感谢舰长大人的英明决定，感谢{mf|他|她}在攻打行星的第一阶段，就做出了威慑敌人的明智抉择。

languages.text: Plusieurs commandants ennemis se trouvaient parmi les hérétiques capturés à notre arrivée. Nous n'avons eu aucun mal à les convaincre de nous montrer l'emplacement exact des cogitateurs et de nous fournir les litanies de déchiffrage permettant d'accéder aux systèmes de défense. Nous avons tous remercié {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} d'avoir eu l'idée judicieuse d'intimider notre adversaire dans les premières heures de l'assaut planétaire.
languages.original_text: There were several enemy commanders among the heretics we captured upon landing. They were eager to show us the exact locations of enemy cogitators and provided us with decryption litanies to access the defence systems. That was the hour when we all thanked the Lord Captain for having made the wise choice of intimidating the enemy at the first stage of the planetary assault.

traits.locale_text: Plusieurs commandants ennemis se trouvaient parmi les hérétiques capturés à notre arrivée. Nous n'avons eu aucun mal à les convaincre de nous montrer l'emplacement exact des cogitateurs et de nous fournir les litanies de déchiffrage permettant d'accéder aux systèmes de défense. Nous avons tous remercié {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} d'avoir eu l'idée judicieuse d'intimider notre adversaire dans les premières heures de l'assaut planétaire.

languages.text: 着陸して捕らえた異端者たちの中には敵の司令官も何人かいた。彼らは敵の考算機の正確な位置を熱心に教えてくれたうえに、防衛システムにアクセスするための暗号典礼を提供してくれた。惑星襲撃の第一段階で敵を威嚇するという賢明な選択をしたことに、全員がロード・キャプテンに感謝した瞬間だった。
languages.original_text: There were several enemy commanders among the heretics we captured upon landing. They were eager to show us the exact locations of enemy cogitators and provided us with decryption litanies to access the defence systems. That was the hour when we all thanked the Lord Captain for having made the wise choice of intimidating the enemy at the first stage of the planetary assault.

traits.locale_text: 着陸して捕らえた異端者たちの中には敵の司令官も何人かいた。彼らは敵の考算機の正確な位置を熱心に教えてくれたうえに、防衛システムにアクセスするための暗号典礼を提供してくれた。惑星襲撃の第一段階で敵を威嚇するという賢明な選択をしたことに、全員がロード・キャプテンに感謝した瞬間だった。

languages.text: Entre los herejes capturados durante el asalto estaban varios de sus comandantes. Estaban más que dispuestos a indicar las posiciones exactas de los cogitadores del enemigo y proporcionarnos las letanías de desencriptación para acceder a los sistemas defensivos. En ese momento, todos supimos apreciar la sabiduría de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán al intimidar al enemigo durante la primera fase del asalto al planeta.
languages.original_text: There were several enemy commanders among the heretics we captured upon landing. They were eager to show us the exact locations of enemy cogitators and provided us with decryption litanies to access the defence systems. That was the hour when we all thanked the Lord Captain for having made the wise choice of intimidating the enemy at the first stage of the planetary assault.

traits.locale_text: Entre los herejes capturados durante el asalto estaban varios de sus comandantes. Estaban más que dispuestos a indicar las posiciones exactas de los cogitadores del enemigo y proporcionarnos las letanías de desencriptación para acceder a los sistemas defensivos. En ese momento, todos supimos apreciar la sabiduría de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán al intimidar al enemigo durante la primera fase del asalto al planeta.

languages.text: Unter den Ketzern, die wir bei der Landung gefangen nahmen, befanden sich auch mehrere feindliche Kommandanten. Sie zeigten uns bereitwillig die genauen Positionen feindlicher Cogitatoren und verrieten uns Entschlüsselungslitaneien, um auf die Verteidigungssysteme zuzugreifen. In dieser Stunde dankten wir alle dem Lord Captain, dass er die weise Entscheidung getroffen hatte, den Feind in der ersten Phase des Planetenangriffs einzuschüchtern.
languages.original_text: There were several enemy commanders among the heretics we captured upon landing. They were eager to show us the exact locations of enemy cogitators and provided us with decryption litanies to access the defence systems. That was the hour when we all thanked the Lord Captain for having made the wise choice of intimidating the enemy at the first stage of the planetary assault.

traits.locale_text: Unter den Ketzern, die wir bei der Landung gefangen nahmen, befanden sich auch mehrere feindliche Kommandanten. Sie zeigten uns bereitwillig die genauen Positionen feindlicher Cogitatoren und verrieten uns Entschlüsselungslitaneien, um auf die Verteidigungssysteme zuzugreifen. In dieser Stunde dankten wir alle dem Lord Captain, dass er die weise Entscheidung getroffen hatte, den Feind in der ersten Phase des Planetenangriffs einzuschüchtern.

languages.text: İniş yaptıktan sonra yakaladığımız kâfirler arasında birkaç düşman komutanı da bulunuyordu. Düşman kavramsayarlarının tam konumunu göstermeye oldukça istekliydiler, savunma sistemlerine erişebilmemiz için gerekli şifre kırma ilahilerini bizimle paylaştılar. İşte o anda Lord Kaptan'a şükrettik zira kendisi, gezegen taarruzunun başında düşmanın gözünü korkutacak doğru bir hamle yapmıştı.
languages.original_text: There were several enemy commanders among the heretics we captured upon landing. They were eager to show us the exact locations of enemy cogitators and provided us with decryption litanies to access the defence systems. That was the hour when we all thanked the Lord Captain for having made the wise choice of intimidating the enemy at the first stage of the planetary assault.
